data.title: LIst Of Holiday's
data.text:
Baisakhi 14th April (Tuesday)

Birthday of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar 14th April (Tuesday)

Shaheedi Diwas Sri Guru Argun Dev ji 22 May (Friday)

SUMMER VACATIONS (From Ist June to 5th July)

Id-ul-Fitar 18th July (Saturday)

Martydom day of Shaheed Udham Singh 31st July (Friday)

Independence Day 15th August (Sunday)

Raksha Bandhan 29th August (Saturday)

Parkash Purab Sri Guru Granth Sahib ji 1 September (Tuesday)

Janam Ashtami 5nd September (Saturday)

Id-ul-Juha 25th September (Friday)

Birthday of Mahatma Gandhi Ji 2nd October (Friday)

Birthday of Guru Ram Dass Ji 9th October (Friday)

Dussehra 22th October (Thursday)

Birthday of Maharishi Valmiki Ji 27nd October (Tuesday)

Karva Chauth 30th October (Friday)

Diwali Break (11 November to 15th November)

Birthday of Sri Guru Nanak Dev Ji 25th Nov. Wednesday

Martydom Day of Sri Guru Teg Bahadur Ji 24th Nov. Tuesday

Winter Break 25th December (Friday) 2015 to 31st Dec. (Thursday) 2015

Birthday of Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji

Makar Sakranti (Maghi)

Republic Day 26th January

Bansant Panchmi/Birthday of Satguru

Birthday of Bhagat Ravidass Ji

Mahashivratri

Holi

Note :

1.Every Second Saturday of the month will be off.

2. Parents Teachers Meeting to be conducted on every last Saturday of the month
